summary: Blood Bank Management System Phase 3 implementation testing completed successfully. All new Alerts system APIs, enhanced Reports module, and complete Returns/Discards workflows are fully functional. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate (24/24 tests passed). Frontend integration testing confirmed all Phase 3 pages load correctly with proper navigation, data display, and user interactions.
passed_tests: Admin Authentication (POST /api/auth/login)
Alerts Summary API (GET /api/alerts/summary) - returns expiry, stock, and operational alerts
Expiring Items API (GET /api/alerts/expiring-items?days=7) - returns expiring units and components
Low Stock Alerts API (GET /api/alerts/low-stock?threshold=5) - returns low stock items
Urgent Requests API (GET /api/alerts/urgent-requests) - returns urgent blood requests
Daily Collections Report API (GET /api/reports/daily-collections)
Inventory Status Report API (GET /api/reports/inventory-status)
Expiry Analysis Report API (GET /api/reports/expiry-analysis)
Discard Analysis Report API (GET /api/reports/discard-analysis)
Testing Outcomes Report API (GET /api/reports/testing-outcomes)
Returns Management APIs (GET /api/returns and POST /api/returns)
Discards Management APIs (GET /api/discards and POST /api/discards)
Frontend Alerts page (/alerts) loads correctly with all sections
Alerts page displays critical alerts (6), expiring items (0), low stock (48), urgent requests (0)
Alerts page operational summary shows pending QC (2), quarantine items (0), etc.
Frontend Reports page (/reports) shows all report types with functional tabs
Reports page daily collections tab displays donation statistics
Reports page inventory, expiry, testing, and discards tabs all functional
Frontend Returns page (/returns) with return processing dialog
Returns page stats cards (Total Returns, Pending QC, Accepted) display correctly
Returns page 'Log Return' dialog opens and validates form inputs
Frontend Discards page (/discards) with discard management
Discards page stats cards (Total Discards, Expired, Reactive, Pending Destruction) display correctly
Discards page 'Log Discard' dialog opens with reason selection dropdown
Navigation between all Phase 3 pages works seamlessly
All Phase 3 pages properly integrated with backend APIs and display real data

success_percentage.backend: 100% (24/24 API endpoints working perfectly, including all Phase 3 features)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all Phase 3 pages load correctly, navigation works, forms functional)
